title: Histogram Construction
body:
The following data represent the number of employees at various restaurants in New York City. Using this data, answer the questions below.
22; 35; 15; 26; 40; 28; 18; 20; 25; 34; 39; 42; 24; 22; 19; 27; 22; 34; 40; 20; 38; and $$28$$

##figure2.gif
lesson: 2.2 Histograms, Frequency Polygons, and Time Series Graphs
